title: Bear Swipe
desc:
Post 2088-5
- Input a 5 or less to play this card.
- Target a player to make them gain the inputted number of **Card Shards**
- Then, store the inputted number as a single-use die that you may use in a future turn, in place of whatever you rolled.
- Only drawable by players with (2088) Bear Potion in their Identity Zone.
